summary: This code is a listener for messages sent through the Chrome runtime. When it receives a message with "something_completed" as the msg key, it logs the subject and content data to the console and potentially plans to interact with tabs but has not yet completed.

details.comment: This code is a listener for messages sent through the Chrome runtime. When it receives a message with "something_completed" as the msg key, it logs the subject and content data to the console and potentially plans to interact with tabs but has not yet completed.
